main event: Two unidentified bright objects were observed flying in formation near Washington National Airport for approximately 45 seconds.
interesting points: The objects were described as round and bright white, measuring twelve to fifteen feet in diameter,The sighting involved two objects that flew at different angles and disappeared over the horizon,The objects were observed on the east side of Hangar, Washington National Airport,The sighting occurred on 12 May 1954, around 12:30 AM,The report came from military personnel and concluded that the objects were unidentified.
witness description: Military personnel from the 1325th Air Police Squadron
